thread.title: The Hague to sign Urban Food Policy Pact (City of The Hague)
thread.title_full: The Hague to sign Urban Food Policy Pact (City of The Hague) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: The Hague to sign Urban Food Policy Pact (City of The Hague)
text: (Source: City of The Hague) The Hague is 1 of the 45 world cities which on 15 October will sign the Urban Food Policy Pact in Milan. This way The Hague recognises the large role it plays as an urban area in the development of food systems based on the principles of sustainability and social justice. The city will commit itself to continuing and developing this role in the coming years. On behalf of The Hague Deputy Mayor Ingrid van Engelshoven will go to the Mayors Summit in Milan to sign the pact. The official ceremony is part of the World Expo 2015 in Milan, 'Feeding the Planet - Energy for Life'. Thirteen Hague-based companies are taking part in the 'Share, Grow, Live' exhibition at the Dutch Court in the Museo Nazionale della Scienza e della Technologia Leonardo da Vinci. This exhibition was curated by the Museon, an interactive museum for culture and science based in The Hague. More information at www.foodpolicymilano.org. distributed by This content was issued by City of The Hague on the 2015-10-08 and was initially posted on www.denhaag.nl. It was distributed, unedited and unaltered, by noodls on 2015-10-08 10:29:13 UTC. The original issuer is solely responsible for the accuracy of the information contained therein. (noodl: 30235782)
